item.description: Only trust your fists. Police will never help you.
item.name: None

item.description: Mr. Saturday night special Got a barrel that's blue and cold Ain't good for nothin' But put a man six feet in a hole
item.name: .38 Revolver

item.description: The perfect piece to make you ask yourself if you feel lucky
item.name: .44 Magnum

item.description: Give a man a gun, he thinks he's Superman. Give him two and he thinks he's God
item.name: 9mm Semiauto

item.description: When you absolutely, positively, got to kill every mother$SWEARFILTER{fucker:hugger} in the room, accept no substitutes
item.name: AK-47

item.description: The fact that you've got "Replica" written down the side of your guns, and the fact that I've got "Desert Eagle point five O" written on the side of mine, should precipitate your balls into shrinking, along with your presence
item.name: Desert Eagle

item.description: The smell of napalm in the morning, evening, or whenever you want to smell like victory
item.name: M2 Flamethrower

item.description: This is my rifle; there are many like it, but this one is mine
item.name: M16

evidence.description: The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring AM radio plans calling listeners "sheep to be told what to think".
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring AM radio plans saying "it's okay to lie, they don't need the truth".
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring AM radio plans planning to drum up a false scandal about a Liberal figure.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring cable news memos calling their news "the vanguard of Conservative thought".
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring cable news memos mandating negative coverage of Liberal politicians.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring cable news memos planning to drum up a false scandal about a Liberal figure.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring cable news memos instructing a female anchor to 'get sexier or get a new job'.

The Liberal Guardian runs more than one thousand pages of documents about the CCS organization, also revealing in extreme detail the names and responsibilities of Conservative Crime Squad sympathizers and supporters in the state and federal governments. Sections precisely document the extensive planning to create an extra-judicial death squad that would be above prosecution, and could hunt down law-abiding Liberals and act as a foil when no other enemies were present to direct public energy against.\nThe scandal reaches into the heart of the Conservative leadership in the country, and the full ramifications of this revelation may not be felt for months. One thing is clear, however, from the immediate public reaction toward the revelations, and the speed with which even AM Radio and Cable News denounce the CCS.\nThis is the beginning of the end for the Conservative Crime Squad.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO that seem to touch on every fetish known to man.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO promising someone company profits in exchange for sexual favors.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO to himself. They're very steamy.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO addressed to his pet dog. Yikes.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO to the judge that acquit him in a corruption trial.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO to an illicit gay lover.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO implying that he has enslaved his houseservants.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring love letters from a major CEO to the FDA official overseeing the CEO's products.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO digging up graves and sleeping with the dead.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO engaging in heavy bondage. A cucumber was involved in some way.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO tongue-kissing an infamous dictator.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO castrating himself.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO waving a Nazi flag at a supremacist rally.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO playing with feces and urine.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO engaging in lewd behavior with animals.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO participating in a murder.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO making out with an FDA official overseeing the CEO's products.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring photos of a major CEO torturing an employee with a hot iron.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring a major CEO's tax papers showing that he has engaged in consistent tax evasion.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the overthrow of a government.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files containing private information on innocent citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the planned assassination of a Liberal federal judge.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting "harmful speech" made by innocent citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files used to keep tabs on gay citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the infiltration of a pro-choice group.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story with evidence of a Conservative judge taking bribes to acquit murderers.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story with evidence of a Conservative judge promising Conservative rulings in exchange for appointments.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting a forced confession.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting widespread corruption in the force.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting human rights abuses by the force.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting a police torture case.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting a systematic invasion of privacy by the force.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring police records documenting gladiatorial matches held between prisoners by guards.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring prison documents documenting human rights abuses by prison guards.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring prison documents documenting widespread corruption among prison employees.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring prison documents documenting gladiatorial matches held between prisoners by guards.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring prison documents ocumenting a prison torture case.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring research papers documenting horrific animal rights abuses.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring research papers studying the effects of torture on cats.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring research papers covering up the accidental creation of a genetic monster.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring research papers showing human test subjects dying under genetic research.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring Corporate files describing a genetic monster created in a lab.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring Corporate files with a list of gay employees entitled "Homo-workers".
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring Corporate files containing a memo: "Terminate the pregnancy, I terminate you."
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring Corporate files cheerfully describing foreign corporate sweatshops.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring Corporate files describing an intricate tax scheme.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the overthrow of a government.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files containing private information on innocent citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the planned assassination of a Liberal federal judge.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting "harmful speech" made by innocent citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files used to keep tabs on gay citizens.
The Liberal Guardian runs a story featuring CIA and other intelligence files documenting the infiltration of a pro-choice group.
